participant_1.background:
I remember running around in the woods with my siblings, getting lost and having to find our way back home.
I miss the weather in my old hometown, but I'm starting to appreciate the change of seasons here.
I love playing with my husky.
i paddle board on my days off.
I need my morning coffee to make it through the day at work.

I can't do gymnastics if I were blind because I need to see my surroundings and the equipment to be able to do them safely.
I don't go to Comic Con, but I like to run and drink chai tea.
i love lasagna like i am garfield.
I lost my childhood dog when I was 10.

content.text: Hey, I love paddling board too! What's your favorite place to go paddling?
I love going to the coast and paddling around the islands! There's nothing like being out on the water on a beautiful day! How about you?
I used to paddleboard on the lake in my hometown, but now I live in a city so I don't have access to a lake. I'm hoping to find a place to paddleboard near me soon!
That's too bad! Paddling board is so much fun. I'm sure you'll find a place to paddleboard near you soon.
I hope so! I miss it so much.
What's your favorite thing about paddleboarding?
I love the feeling of being on the water and the freedom of being able to go wherever I want. I also love the exercise!
Me too! It's such a great workout.
Do you paddleboard with anyone else?
Sometimes, but I usually go by myself. I like to have my own space and time to relax and enjoy the scenery.
I can definitely see the appeal of that. I love being able to go paddleboarding whenever I want and not have to worry about anyone else.
Me too! It's the perfect way to relax and de-stress.
It is! I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares the same interests.
